greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = number of nonzero elements of multiplicative order k in Galois field GF(2^n) (n >= 1, 1 <= k <= 2^n-1).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16369 (rows 1 to 13, flattened)
formula: T(n,k) = A000010(k) if k is a divisor of 2^n-1, otherwise 0.
maple: f:= proc(n,k) if 2^n-1 mod k = 0 then numtheory:-phi(k) else 0 fi end proc:
program: (MAGMA) {* Order(g) : g in GF(2^6) | g ne 0 *};
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 01 2000
